sect2.title: System.AddYears
sect2.para: Adds the specified number of Years to the given DateTime and returns it.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select TableDee add {Date().AddYears(6) SixYears}; // returns the date 6 years from today. select TableDee add {AddYears(DateTime(),-1) LastYear}; // returns the date represented by 1 year ago from now.
